reviews.review:
Really intense at times. I enjoy playing this game, despite thinking Friday the 13th is much more polished and well thought out..... While this is multiplayer only I really think it needs a single player campaign to add some longevity to it.

Fast foward to now. Lobby's are a corpse to put it bluntly. All the DLC in the world won't matter without a single player campaign.

After 1000+ hours I can not recommend this game.. its repetitive, very survivor-favored and the killer is just a neglected role. At first it may look scary and fun, but gets repetitive and frustrating fast, there are simply better games out there.
There are just too many things to name which I dont bother to mention that are a big issue in this game.

Играю я значит в Dead by Daylight с друзьями, началась катка, пошёл чинить двигатель...
И тут хpeнak как из-за угла выбегает "Канибал", я собрался валить, а он такой заводит бензопилу и РЕЖИТ МЕНЯ СО СПИНЫ, я пересрался...
Потом взял он меня на своё жирное плечо и потащил к крюку, повесил меня, и всё, думал что пиздец...
Но не тут то было, подбегает ко мне друг, а маньяк то кемпером оказался, так друг пересрался и убежал, а маньяк за ним.
Друг дебилом оказался, привёл убийцу к остальныйм выжившим, кoторые тем временем чинили двигатель, так убийца их троих и порубил бензопилой.
10 даунов из 10
bug什么时候修复啊

这是一款非常不错的游戏，说是恐怖游戏也不是完全的恐怖，有屠夫伤人时的鲜血，有逃生者心脏跳动的紧张感。
画质可圈可点，但是对显卡要求偏高，网吧的电脑一般是带不起来的。游戏采用的是猫鼠游戏的玩法，不过匹配机制自我感觉并不完善，新手总是匹配到十分会玩的人玩人的时候倒还好，只是三带一(玩鬼的时候你懂的)，68块钱完全是值的，有的时候还会打折买(全价入手也不亏啊)，游戏的DLC很多，节日的时候一般也会打折，可以买一些扩展角色包(自我感觉皮肤包没什么大用)，土豪玩家请随意。
注意:这是一款没有新手教程的游戏，所以小白玩的时候一般要先查查攻略，适当地找找地图的重要点(玩多了就好了)。
屠夫都是要自己的背景的(在设定上看得出制作组花费了很大的功夫)，关于恶灵吞噬对于新手玩家是比较坑的(也就是所谓的吞血网)当然你们可以度娘啊。
本人玩这款游戏的时间也不多，有错误的地方欢迎老玩家指正。
快入手一个玩得开心吧！
I like this game!
EZ PEZ
紧张刺激

Обожаю такие игры!!! Зашёл играть за выживших. Всё было хорошо-чинил генераторы, спасал своих. Но тут я остался один. Бегал минут 5 искал люк. В итоге нашёл маньяка который стоял и не двигался, а просто смотрел по сторонам.Тогда я понял, что он охраняет люк и стал ждать, пока он уйдёт. Ещё через 5 минут он отошёл, и я подумал, что это мой шанс. Побежал к люку. Сиганул в него. И как только от моей головы остался один сраный волос. Он схватил меня за него и повесил на крюк.
Ну а если в общем то игра топ. Всем советую.

Почему игра плохая?

когда-нибудь разработчики всё-таки догадаются убрать из игры палет-лупинг и сделает сурвов именно выжившими, а не терминаторами. отважная четвёрка ремонтников и один стажёр, который им противостоит.


но для начала было бы здорово что бы в игре было хоть какое-то разделение по скилу - играть с опытом 10+ часов против 200+ - не ок.
хотя скорее разработчиков залёт цунами вайна сурвов, ведь так сложно играть, когда ну всё сделано, что бы квартет Б Л R Д Е Й смог выжить.

тут тебе и перки, и окружение, и обзор, и звуковое оповещение с двойной градацией, и дополнения со слотами позволяющее выздороветь или починить объект мгновенно.
Ах да, если предмет не был израсходован целиком - он перезаряжается бесплатно.

Удивительное дело, но с маньяками дела обстоят прямо противоположно.
Перк на НОЕД - понерфлен, теперь это тотем. Сломали = ГГ.
Мементо - понерфили, теперь пока не повесишь хотя бы 1 раз = не убьёшь. А, у 2 из 4 персонажей осколок? Да не, ну что вы, совсем не имба. Ауры смертельно раненных видно? Ауру висящего на круке видно? Не, это баланс.

Ну и куда же без претезий на счёт геймплея маньяков. Они должны после повешенья сурва идти в подвал к Энтити и досчитать до десяти, а потом уже идти дальше. Иначе в чат после матча будут лить содержимое черепной коробки. То, что это противоречит лору избалованные сурвы не желают слышать от слова совсем.

У меня стойкое чувство, что тут 4 маньяка и один выживший.
Was soll ich sagen macht richtig Bock.Wer gut sich erdenken kann was der nächste Schritt des anderen (Killer/Survivor) sein wird , wird jede Menge spaß haben
Game is so unbalanced now. If you want to play killer you'll have an easy blast, if you want to play survivor now you'll be fighting an uphill battle that you'll lose more often than you'll win.
很好玩 很有气氛
为啥玩不了

Après presque 400 heures de jeu, je me décide a poster une évaluation. 

[u]Déroulement d'une partie[/u]

Le jeu se joue en 4 contre 1 (4 survivants contre 1 tueur), il existe plusieurs tueurs dont certains sont jouables qu'après avoir acheté le DLC correspondant.

Chaque partie consistera a démarrer 5 générateurs avec l'aide des autres survivants, afin d'ouvrir une des deux portes de la Map permettant de s'echapper, tout en devant échapper au griffe du tueur qui essayera d'accrocher chaque joueur a un des crochets.

Une fois accroché, vous n'aurez d'autres choix qu'espérer qu'un joueur vienne vous liberer avant que votre jauge de vie s'épuise totalement.

[u]Mon avis sur le jeu[/u]

J'ai connu ce jeu bien avant la sortie officiel, ayant joué en tant qu'alpha testeur en session fermé, j'ai pu voir l'evolution du jeu.

Et je dois dire qu'il est assez agréable de voir que l'équipe du jeu est à l'écoute des joueurs, sans cesse en train de reéquilibrer le niveau des tueurs ou des survivants pour que le jeu puisse être aussi amusant pour les tueurs que les survivants.

Il est important de comprendre que c'est un jeu de coopération et que tout seul, vous aurez très peu de chance de survivre.

Malgré que certains joueurs trouvent certains tueurs peu fairplay (ex: facecamping), le système de récompense permet d'handicaper ce type de pratique en privant les tueurs qui le pratique d'un nombre considérable de bloodpoint.

En bref je suis très satisfait du jeu et du contenu sans cesse ajouter/modifier pour rendre le jeu tout aussi amusant après plusieurs heures de jeu. 

Contrairement a beaucoup de jeux du même genre, Dead By Daylight fait partie d'un des rares jeux qu'on ne désinstalle pas et ou on y revient souvent.

BAH!

I really love this game but at the same time i really hate it too.  Admittedly I am not all that good at it  most of the time though now and again I do have the odd stand-out performance  but that isn't really an issue.  As a team based objective and survival base game (or as a kill everyone that isn't you game) it's fun to play, and if you have a party of friends playing it together it is the ideal game.  

But I hate the DLC, having bought all but one of them i have noticed how there's little variety between the characters, between what each pack offers, and while it is not essential I guess to but the DLC without it I suppose it may feel like less of a game.

I am giving this a thumbs up and recommending Dead By Daylight, purely on the merits of the base game however I would have reservations about recommending the DLC packs and urge people to research them before purchasing if they are unsure.

Кусок ebanogo govna,в которой багов хоть жопой жуй.Разрабы последние pidoрасы которые забили ][yi на эту игру,просто кидают малолеткам скинов чтобы схавали и потратили бабки.
Комьюнити тупорылых даунов(фанатов Хеллхаунда)и которые задрачивают в эту игру сутками чтобы быть киберспортом в игре в которой баланса НИКОГДА не будет,также как и никогда их отец не вернётся домой.
Про хиты и тикрейт в этой мусорке я вообще молчу,это полный pizдец.....
Эта игра сдохнет через год-полтора,после того как в неё прекратят донатить овощные малолетки.
Мой умозаключение такое: Dead by Daylight не стоит тех денег которых за неё просят разрабы,по факту она и копейки не стоит.
Тупое тупого говна.

I DO NOT RECOMMEND THIS GAME TO ANYONE.. Reason being this game is completly one sided and unbalanced. The survivors perks are way too over powered and they just shit all over the killer. As the killer you literally just get abused by survivors with D strike, sprint burst and so many others. All they need to know to be good is to run around a pallet while you have to chase them all game not to mention the generator rushing and BNPs they use as add ons on their items to end the match faster so you lose then go on a rant about how youre bad at the end of the match. This is one of the most toxic games i ever played. 

I also lost all my progress at one point i told the Support about it and they said they working on it. Its been almost a month if not already and no responds. Seriously wouldnt recommend this game to anyone its a waste of life and the money. All they do is work on all the Famous movie killers to make money off of and sell their broken ass bugg filled game..

Dead By Daylight is an asymmetrical multiplayer game, which means it has to deal with being a double-edged sword. The gameplay is fun and unique, but also suffers from an extremely salty community because it's hard to balance two vastly different styles of gameplay between the first-person perspective of the killers and the third-person perspective of the survivors. I still highly recommend it though because there are very few games like this out there.

I přes velké glitche, které občas člověku zkazi náladu a některé hráče, kteri by potřebovali nakopat, je to solidní hra, která dokáže na pár desítek/stovek hodin zabavit. Velké plus maji vývojáři hry u nichž je vidět, že na hře pracují a  snaží se přidávat nový kontent. Nové mapy, nový killeri, nový přeživší. Škoda jen, že okatě dávají najevo, ze Killeri jsou pro ně prioritní, protože neni killera bez přeživšího a naopak.
+ zábavná hra s přáteli
+ nový kontent

- bugy...
- nevyváženost mezi killerem a přeživší

The game its enjoyable while playing survivor but sweaty and harder when you play killer. The models are great, the atmosphere too and the graphics, but the loops and the fact that you can make the killer chase you for alot of time in circles make the game unrealistic you dont see often in scary movies 2 people running in circles do you xD. Still its 7/10 for me.

REVIEW EDITED AT BOTTOM

I only have a little more than 100 hours on this game but I've been consistently watching streams of it since it came out and have kept up with it since longgg before I finally picked up my own PC. It used to be pretty balanced, with balance patches here and there mixing up the meta. 

Now, this 1v4, intentionally imbalanced, "survive against all odds", horror game has become a 1v4 "try and get a kill against all odds", surprisingly balanced for a 1v4, bully-the-killer game.

Over the last few months, patches keep coming out that directly address complaints of survivor mains, then either ignore, barely touch on, or outright claim it's not a problem whenever killer mains have any complaints of things in game that had really ought to be changed. This has resulted in the survivors being able to negate things the killers do that take a lot of effort (outplaying a survivor to get two hits on him, hooking someone, etc.)  by just standing in the right spot, equipping one perk forever, or doing one skill check.

Despite the survivors becoming more and more unnecessarily powerful, and the people who play mostly killer continuously and loudly voicing their concerns, the developers release patch after patch after patch and have developer live streams where they announce that they will not be working on things the killers would like changed at any point in the near future, but have many plans to tend to the wishes of the survivors. I used to be a killer main and this was my most played game. Now I sometimes get back on to play survivor, but I've moved onto other games. It's a crying shame. Do not buy this until the devs make an effort to fix it, which, if the last handful of awful patches are any indication, won't be any time soon.

EDIT 1: I definitely purchased this game at full price, I'm not sure why it says I got this for free...

EDIT 2: I've more than doubled my hours since this review, and I can say now that the game is in a better place than it was at the time of the above review. The developer (BHVR) has purchased the full rights of their game from their publisher (can't remember the name), and it has been only great stuff since then. There's been way more communication, way more use of the play test server for big changes, and way more ACTUALLY listening to the community. I'm far happier now with the game than I was before, and I'm happy to change my review to positive.

Obligated to say maybe this more positive experience is because I'm now a survivor main...  ¯\_(ツ)_/¯

It's a crying shame that the devs of this game can't stand up to the survivor community turning what could be one of the greatist game of its kind into well....this.  The devs let exploits run while just to appease the survivor community. So if you are looking for a balanced game, look elsewhere.

Dead by Daylight é um jogo realmente peculiar para mim, pois tenho muitos sentimentos de amor e ódio por ele, e isso se deve ao fato de que ao mesmo tempo que ele é bem divertido e único, possui uma comunidade extremamente tóxica que as vezes dá até desanimo de jogar.

E aí você se questiona, mas como alguém pode ser tóxico se nem é possível conversar durante o jogo? Ahhh meu amigo, você nem imagina as coisas que fazem em uma partida, se não for uma pessoa bem controlada é jogar e pedir para passar raiva.

Ignorando esse maldito lado do jogo (o que é comum em qualquer multiplayer por aí né, pessoas ...), DBD é muito viciante, mesmo que a premissa dele seja bem simples e não possua muitos modos de jogo, pelo menos para mim ele nunca se torna enjoativo, pois a infinidade de perks, assassinos, mapas e habilidades faz com que cada partida seja única.

Recomendo? Sim, claro, mesmo que a comunidade seja como eu disse, e o jogo possua inúmeras DLCs pagas (conteúdos que não são licenciados dá para comprar com "moeda do jogo"), para quem gosta do gênero terror e multiplayer, é um prato cheio, você não vai encontrar nenhum jogo do tipo com qualidade melhor que DBD, isso eu garanto.

This game had a lot of promise but the devs have proven time and again they have a poor grasp of game balancing.  As it stands, the game is blatantly survivor sided.  While it makes sense to appease the majority of players, it also makes sense to do so in such a way as to keep the killers satisfied as well.  Right now it is just an exercise in frustration and abuse to play the role of killer.  

If you get this game for 10 bucks you will get your money's worth, but if you want to play it competitively (or as competitively as an asymmetrical framework will allow), look elsewhere.

over 3,100 hours in and DbD is still fun but still has the same issues: Survivors rule the game, anything strong that Killers have gets nerfed into oblivion, the meta has barely changed and its still a loopfest. But that may change as of today, with the release of the Resident Evil chapter on the Public Test Build and a new Killer - Nemesis. He's fun. he's strong...and survivors hate him. How badly (or if) he gets nerfed will tell you what BHVR is all about. Watch this review in the coming weeks; for now: Tentative would recommend. This is a big step for DbD, as long as BHVR doesn't fuck it up.

НО ЭТО ЛАДНО ЕГО МОЖНО ОБЫГРАТЬ НО КОГДА ЭТО СКОТИНА КЕМПЕРИТ(ждёт пока жертва сдохнет на крюке и не даёт её спасти) НЕТ ШАНСОВ "0" "ZERO". А так игра хорошая рекомендую!

OK so the game play is good and it can be fun. but there is not anything built into the game to prevent killers from just focusing people dead. When your advancement is dependednt on obtaining a minium amount of points each game, makes it hard to get to where the sportsmanship is better. 
Other big issue is that there is nothing to prevent a player from being camped... so in a match with no outside comunication its hard to get more then 1 person to come get you much less 2 one for bait and the other to get you off the stake. The whole time someone needs to be getting generators.

People would say ballance i would say sportsman ship is needed
but seems like the game needs to put that into it.. diminshing blood points for spiking the same survier in a row.  Enitity timer does not progress while killer is within heart beat of spiked player.  
I find that i get focus down way to much to enjoy the game in the long run
